title: Problem-Solving Competency Strengthening through Technical Education: Experience-Based Learning Program

context.additional_context: Designing experience-based learning implementable in smartphone-centered limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more stages of a design process using everyday materials (e.g., metal, wood) to solve given technical problems.
Learners can identify and apply five or more material selection criteria through online interactions with peers and experts.
Learners can improve problem-solving strategies through at least three iterative design feedback experiences in virtual workshops within an LMS.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
